name: 1950's GRANGE Concept Design
description:
This is la GRANGE.

I imagined something like this:


Year, 1950s. All the world just like in the 1950s.

The only difference is that you can create a website in a way.


So, a website where a fashion designer showcases his new designs, I wondered what it would look like in the 1950s.


I used Humanist Sans-Serif Typeface: Optima. Typeface has released 1957.


-------------------


I am waiting for your feedback. 

I hope you enjoy this design.


Check it out my portfolio:
